root.name: PImage
root.description:
Datatype for storing images. Mobile Processing allows display of .png images. The PImage object contains properties for the width and height of the image.
Mobile Processing has additional constraints due to the way images are handled on the mobile phone. A PImage object loaded from a .png file can have transparent pixels, but cannot be modified with the copy() method. A PImage object created in memory using new PImage(width, height) cannot have transparent pixels, but can be modified with the copy() method.
